segments.text: Wow , American football is more exciting than I thought .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You ’ re in America now , my British friend . We just call it football .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , right . So , I can ’ t quite follow what ’ s going on ... who ’ s winning ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The Giants are up by three points because of the field goal they kicked , but the Redskins have the ball and there pretty close to the end zone .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , he tackled him so hard his helmet came off .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It looks like it , he ’ s getting up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I guess he hit him too hard ; the referee just called a penalty on the home team .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What happened ? Why did everyone get so quiet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The Redskin ’ s quarterback just threw a touchdown pass for seven points . We ’ re losing again .
segments.speaker: S2
